movie.title: Everything Beautiful Is Far Away
movie.description_intro: A guy, a girl, and a robothead hike across a desert planet in search of a mythical lake.
movie.description_full: A guy, a girl, and a robothead hike across a desert planet in search of a mythical lake.

movies.title: COVID-19: The System
movies.summary: COVID-19 "THE SYSTEM" The whole world is in Lock Down. There is panic in society. What is going on? After the Prime Minister's speech about the highly contagious "Corona" virus, Nico Sloot, an international entrepreneur, joined forces with scientists, doctors, and experts to find answers to the questions surrounding the coronavirus. How dangerous is this virus? What does our future look like? Are the current measures in proportion to the virus? And what impact does this have on our society? During Nico's quest, he makes shocking findings. - Is this actually about our public health?
movies.description_full: COVID-19 "THE SYSTEM" The whole world is in Lock Down. There is panic in society. What is going on? During Nico's quest, he makes shocking findings. - Is this actually about our public health?

movies.title: The Little Mermaid
movies.summary: A young reporter and his niece discover a beautiful and enchanting creature they believe to be the real little mermaid.
movies.description_full: A young reporter and his niece discover a beautiful and enchanting creature they believe to be the real little mermaid.
movies.synopsis: A young reporter and his niece discover a beautiful and enchanting creature they believe to be the real little mermaid.

movies.title: Noelle
movies.summary: Noelle has always had to support and encourage her brother Nick, who was ordained to take over as Santa. When Nick disappears right before Christmas, Noelle goes on a funny and heartfelt journey to find him and, ultimately, what Christmas is really about.

movies.title: Hocus Pocus
movies.summary: 300 years have passed since the Sanderson sisters were executed for practicing dark witchcraft. Returning to life thanks to a combination of a spell spoken before their demise and the accidental actions of Max, the new-kid-in-town, the sisters have but one night to secure their continuing existence...
